author: Brian Turner
method: Place the feta, tomato, raisins and herbs together in a small bowl and gently stir to combine. Whisk the olive oil with the red wine vinegar in a separate bowl and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad and stir to coat the salad well.
